input_modalities: Non-Voice Acoustics (lows, sip-and-puff, and directional air swipe)
contribution_desc: This paper presents a non-voice acoustic recognition system on smartwatches. It describes one application of cross-device (between smartphone and smartwatch) data transfer using a "sip" and "puff" input. I have decided to tag this paper, because it presents a novel cross-device interaction technique.
device_models: LG G (Android) Watch; Motorola Droid Turbo (Android) smartphone
